name: Farm at the End of Time
name_original: Farm at the End of Time
description:
The world is ending, and the world is now using space bucks as currency due to the condition that everyone lives on floating rocks. You are a blessing, a savior, a farmer. The people have pulled together all the land they could so that you could find a way to feed them, this doesn't stop the space government from still charging you for your land though so you'll have to find a way to make a living yourself.

There is a bright side, you own the remote...

Note:

If you want to skip the tutorial the only controls you need is your mouse and space bar.

The project file is Open Source everything in it was made by me during the jam and the code is pretty bad with everything relying on the GameSession singleton. If you want to play this for some ungodly reason with a bigger farm you just have to change the size of the array in game session on the Game scene and then resize the confider for the camera.

P.S.
Game was made for Brackey game jam 2020_2 with the rewind theme.
There is no end goal just some happy farming.

Enjoy.
